title.rendered: Messi is the partner of Haaland-Vinny-Mbappe in the FIFA best XI

content.rendered:
Age 36; Lionel Messi has even left Europe and moved to American football. In his absence, the three best forwards of all time, Arling Haaland, Kylian Mbappé and Vinicius Junior, have been rocking Europe.However, Messi got a place in the FIFA XI of the Year. But there was no place for Cristiano Ronaldo.

The best XI of the year was announced today at ‘The Best FIFA Football Awards’ in London. Considering the performance of the period from December 19, 2022 to August 20, 2023, all 6 of this eleven are treble-winning Manchester City. And three people got a place from Real Madrid.

All three defenders in the FIFA XI of the Year are City – John Stones, Kyle Walker and Ruben Dias. Even two of the three midfielders, Kevin De Bruyne and Bernardo Silva, are members of the same club. The third is Real Madrid’s English star Jude Bellingham.

There are four forwards in the XI. One of them is Argentina’s World Cup-winning captain Messi. With him in the attack is Norwegian striker Haaland, the main hero of City’s treble-winning team. Their partner in attack is Mbappe of French champion PSG and Real star Vinicius.

Thibaut Courtois is the goalkeeper of the XI.
